decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): 2406-P-801 Rev P0 Site Location Plan, 2406-P-802 P0 Block Plan, 2406-P-803 P0 Block Plan, 2406-P-811 P0 Existing Plans, 2406-P-812 P0 Existing Section, 2406-P-813 P0 Existing Front and Rear Elevations, 2406-P-814 P0 Existing Side Elevations, 2406-P-821 P0 Proposed Plans, 2406-P-822 P0 Proposed Section, 2406-P-823 P0 Proposed Front and Rear Elevations, 2406-P-824 P0 Proposed Side Elevations
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| The proposed rooflight hereby approved shall be in accordance with the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2)

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
description: Roof extension to rear (main) roofslope; part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope
